level.heading: Senior HIV/AIDS Education and Outreach Program establishment.
level.text: There is established within the Department the Senior HIV/AIDS Education and Outreach Program, which shall train seniors to provide information to other seniors on how to prevent the transmission of HIV and to engage in education and outreach on issues related to HIV and AIDS with community-based providers that serve seniors in the District.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 7-1631.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-152
level.text: For history of Law 19-152, see notes under ยง 7-1631.
